item.description:
@Ramenryoko wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:3, topic:3373”]Code is so much more understandable when you put spaces between the " " " and the " + ".

And why are the prompt strings “declared” twice? You only need to do it once.[/quote]

It started out as something else, lol. Not to was about four in the morning, so pity me. xD

item.title: I was bored, soo
item.dc:creator: @Ramenryoko Ramenryoko
item.description:
@Ramenryoko wrote:

I made this last night when I was bored, let me know what you think. xD

[code]import javax.swing.JOptionPane;

public class Add2Numbers {

public static void main (String args[]) {
	String prompt_string1 = "Enter the first integer.",	prompt_string2 = "Enter the second integer.", message = "";
	
	String noOne = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(""+prompt_string1);
	prompt_string1 = "Enter the first integer.";
	
	String noTwo = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(""+prompt_string2);
	prompt_string2 = "Enter the second integer.";
	
	int result = (Integer.parseInt(noOne) + Integer.parseInt(noTwo));
	message = "The sum is: ["+result+"]";
	JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, ""+message, "Sum", JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE);
	System.exit(0);
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
